Typedef Documentation

typedef struct MmwDemo_MCB_t MmwDemo_MCB

Millimeter Wave Demo MCB.

The structure is used to hold all the relevant information for the Millimeter Wave demo

typedef struct MmwDemo_Stats_t MmwDemo_Stats

Millimeter Wave Demo statistics.

The structure is used to hold the statistics information for the Millimeter Wave demo

void MmwDemo_dataPathConfig ( void  )

Description
The function is used to configure the data path based on the chirp profile. After this function is executed, the data path processing will ready to go when the ADC buffer starts receiving samples corresponding to the chirps.

Return values
NotApplicable.

void MmwDemo_notifySensorStart ( bool  doReconfig)

Description
This is a utility function which can be invoked from the CLI or the Switch press to start the sensor. This sends an event to the sensor management task where the actual start procedure is implemented.

Return values
Notapplicable
